about_the_game:
Little Herbal Baker is a cozy and laid-back game where you play as Lilia, a novice baker who has freshly arrived in a town called ‘MILKYWOOD’ in the fantastical world. Taking over a bakery formerly managed by a master baker, you are now embarking on your journey to become a master baker.

  • Gather dozens of ingredients in the wilderness to create baked goods that everyone loves. Sometimes new ingredients will inspire new recipes!

  • Explore mysterious wilderness areas where you will meet various cute spirits. Interact with them to collect special ingredients.

  • Unlock more areas of the wilderness and discover different landscapes.

  • Equip various Charms to gain diverse collection perks.

Cute little creatures are always endearing. Spirits will appear in the wilderness, and you can interact with both animals and spirits. Some animals might want to come home with you!

  • Create delicious bread and cakes that warm people's hearts while also boosting your reputation. Of course, don't forget to pay the rent. Be aware, the greater your fame, the more likely you are to attract the attention of the notorious Bakers' Guild of the Kingdom.

  • Unlock more rooms and equipment to meet the increasingly numerous demands of customers as your fame grows.

  • Discover a variety of recipes to satisfy customers' expectations.

  • Befriend the charming townsfolk and delve into their stories. Become a member of Milkywood!

  • Fall in love with one of the marriage candidates, who could be a vampire, dwarf, or elf.

  • Unfold the stories of Milkywood.

About Me

Little Herbal Baker is created by a single person. In this world, the townsfolk have their own little stories, and you can explore at your own pace with ease. May this game bring some healing to you, as that was my intention in making it, and I really hope you enjoy this game that I made with love. 💛

short_description: As the novice baker Lilia, you will immerse yourself in the warm town of MILKYWOOD. Gather ingredients in wilderness areas, interact with spirits, and hone your baking skills. Don't forget to open your bakery, and befriend the charming townsfolk! Everything is cozy & relaxing. 🥨✨
